creator: lipscombtech
title: Stop-Motion Claymation
materials_required: Clay or other pliable material for characters
Camera or smartphone for taking pictures
description: This project outlines the process of creating a stop-motion claymation video. Stop-motion animation involves moving a figure slightly between each photograph, and then compiling the photos into a video to create the illusion of movement.
steps: Create a set using paper, paint, and sand to represent a town called 'Crooks'. The buildings are made from black, white, and gray paper. The water is painted and the beach is made from sand.
Plan the scene and characters for the movie.
Practice the scene to refine the animation.
Film the stop-motion video by taking pictures after slightly moving the characters.
Combine all the still images into a video using video editing software and add sound effects to complete the final product.
